scripts.text:
update [dbo].[CONTROL_TABLE] set 
WATERMARK = coalesce(
CASE WHEN @P_LAST_CDC_DATE='None' THEN null 
WHEN @P_LAST_CDC_DATE > FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'yyyyMMdd') THEN  FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'yyyyMMdd')
ELSE @P_LAST_CDC_DATE END
,WATERMARK)
 where [SERVER] = @P_SERVER and TABLENAME = @P_TABLENAME and PROJECT_NAME= @P_PROJECT_NAME AND [SCHEMA]= @P_SCHEMA

update [dbo].[CONTROL_TABLE] set 
FULL_LOAD_FLAG = 'Y'
 where [SERVER] = @P_SERVER and TABLENAME = @P_TABLENAME and PROJECT_NAME= @P_PROJECT_NAME AND [SCHEMA]= @P_SCHEMA

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT ',    
    pipeline().parameters.P_SELECT_COLUMN,
    ',GETUTCDATE() _LOAD_TIME FROM [',
    
    pipeline().parameters.P_SYSTEM,
    '].[',
    pipeline().parameters.P_SCHEMA,
    '].[',
    pipeline().parameters.P_TABLENAME,
    '] WHERE ',
    pipeline().parameters.P_WATERMARK_COLUMN,
    ' > ',
    '''',
    pipeline().parameters.P_WATERMARK,
    ''''
)
